title: I have a very bad cellular reception with my Pixel3. How can I fix this?
content:
I have a brand new Pixel 3 and I have very bad cellular reception. After a minute or so speaking in the  phone, it is getting scattered and unfragmented voice. Both for me and the person I talk to. Sometimes the call drops out and I have to recall.

This problem is consistent for every call I make. 

I have tried to move my SIM card to another phone and then it works excellent with the other phone. I have also tried to restart the phone. Nothing helps.
